# Calvia.app

> Calvia.app is the modern digital business directory for Calvia, Mallorca's southwest coast. It connects 1,400+ local businesses across 39 categories and 23 villages with international residents, second-home owners, and visitors. Available in 11 languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Dutch, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, Polish, Russian, and Ukrainian.

## Pages

- [Home](https://calvia.app/en): Main landing page with search, categories, areas overview, and early bird signup
- [Business Directory](https://calvia.app/en/businesses): Browse 1,400+ businesses across 39 categories with filters by category and location
- [Areas](https://calvia.app/en/areas): Explore 23 villages and neighborhoods in Calvia including Palmanova, Santa Ponca, Portals Nous, Magaluf, and more
- [Guides & Tips](https://calvia.app/en/guides): Local guides covering beaches, hiking trails, bike trails, and insider recommendations
- [About](https://calvia.app/en/about): About the calvia.group ecosystem, benefits for users and businesses, brand information, and contact form
- [Consumer Signup](https://calvia.app/en/signup/consumer): Early bird registration for residents and visitors
- [Business Signup](https://calvia.app/en/signup/business): Early bird registration for local businesses
- [Privacy Policy](https://calvia.app/en/privacy): Data protection and privacy information

## Areas (23 Villages)

- [Bendinat](https://calvia.app/en/areas/bendinat): Upscale residential area with luxury villas
- [Palmanova](https://calvia.app/en/areas/palmanova): Family-friendly resort town with sandy beaches
- [Santa Ponca](https://calvia.app/en/areas/santa-ponca): Popular area with large international community
- [Portals Nous](https://calvia.app/en/areas/portals-nous): Exclusive area near Puerto Portals marina
- [Magaluf](https://calvia.app/en/areas/magaluf): Entertainment hub undergoing upscale transformation
- [Peguera](https://calvia.app/en/areas/peguera): Charming coastal town with pine-fringed beaches
- [Calvia Vila](https://calvia.app/en/areas/calvia-vila): Historic town center and municipal seat
- [Port Adriano](https://calvia.app/en/areas/port-adriano): Designer marina by Philippe Starck
- [Cas Catala](https://calvia.app/en/areas/cas-catala): Quiet residential area with sea views
- [Costa den Blanes](https://calvia.app/en/areas/costa-den-blanes): Residential enclave near Marineland
- [Costa de la Calma](https://calvia.app/en/areas/costa-de-la-calma): Peaceful coastal residential area
- [El Toro](https://calvia.app/en/areas/el-toro): Growing area near Port Adriano
- [Es Capdella](https://calvia.app/en/areas/es-capdella): Traditional Mallorcan mountain village
- [Galatzo](https://calvia.app/en/areas/galatzo): Rural area near Serra de Tramuntana
- [Portals Vells](https://calvia.app/en/areas/portals-vells): Secluded cove area with natural beauty
- [Sa Porrasa](https://calvia.app/en/areas/sa-porrasa): Residential area between Palmanova and Magaluf
- [Ses Illetes](https://calvia.app/en/areas/ses-illetes): Exclusive beachfront area
- [Sol de Mallorca](https://calvia.app/en/areas/sol-de-mallorca): Upscale gated community
- [Son Caliu](https://calvia.app/en/areas/son-caliu): Family-oriented residential area
- [Son Ferrer](https://calvia.app/en/areas/son-ferrer): Growing residential community
- [Torrenova](https://calvia.app/en/areas/torrenova): Coastal area adjacent to Palmanova
- [Cala Fornells](https://calvia.app/en/areas/cala-fornells): Picturesque cove near Peguera
- [Cala Vinyes](https://calvia.app/en/areas/cala-vinyes): Residential bay area
